name: Singing Sands
description:
Singing Sands makes you feel the rhythm of the desert and adapt to it. With drum beats, you will protect your tribe from sand storms, find the right direction and navigate them to shelter. But be aware - it will get faster in the next level.  If you play your beats right, you'll make it to the oasis.

Singing Sands has been developed as a semester project by four students of Bauhaus-University Weimar between the months of April and July 2022.

Adam Streicher 

Lisa Zwinzscher

Özgesu Özen

Tobias Friedel

The original Singing Sands concept was created by Navid Bayat and Adam Streicher Aalto University, Finland in 2021. Title design by Shambhavi Singh. Thanks to Prof. Dr. Charles Wüthrich, Gianluca Pandolfo and Bauhaus Gamesfabrik.
